backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report containing no features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files and assets.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for logs, node_modules, build artifacts, editor files, and Netlify ZIPs.
frontend/index.css: Global stylesheet; content empty in this snapshot.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, Google verification tag, fonts, and script mount point.
frontend/NETLIFY_DEPLOY.md: Guide for exporting and deploying the frontend to Netlify.
frontend/netlify.toml: Netlify config specifying build command, publish directory, and SPA redirect rules.
frontend/public/_redirects: SPA redirect rule mapping all paths to index.html.
frontend/public/googlecdab296682a0e0eb.h: Google Search Console verification HTML file.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers and pointing to sitemap URL.
frontend/scripts/export-netlify-zip.mjs: Build-and-zip script that validates output files and creates a Netlify-ready ZIP archive.
frontend/scripts/verify-google-site-veri: Script checking Google verification meta tags and presence of required Netlify files.
frontend/SECURITY.md: Security best practices and required headers for Internet Computer deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with layout, routes, header, side menu, contact buttons, and footer.
frontend/src/components/BannerCarousel.t: Auto-playing, pausable banner carousel with navigation arrows and dot indicators.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Responsive grid of category cards linking to category pages, filtering invalid images.
frontend/src/components/FloatingContactB: Renders floating phone and WhatsApp action buttons using site data links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header showing menu toggle, brand name, and service locations.
frontend/src/components/icons.tsx: Exports SVG icon components for common UI actions.
frontend/src/components/Lightbox.tsx: Full‑screen image viewer with next/previous navigation and keyboard controls.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreasPopu: Static section listing service areas and SEO‑focused descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SideMenu.tsx: Slide‑in mobile menu listing categories and a call button with close/escape handling.
frontend/src/config/siteData.ts: Defines site metadata, contact info, and category list with slugs and images.
frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts: Provides banner images and gallery image lists for each category.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains no logic and exports nothing, serving as a placeholder since the backend has no query methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Custom hook that updates document title, meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter tags, and canonical link based on provided SEO options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and extensive custom theme variables defining light/dark color palettes, typography, and accessibility rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryGalleryPage.t: Displays a category-specific balloon decoration gallery with SEO settings, navigation, image filtering, and lightbox support.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing banners, category grid, service sections, and SEO metadata setup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, shadows, and animations based on custom CSS variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, pending feature requests, and deployment-related requirements for generating Netlify-ready builds.
